description: Drug modules for drug-module based questionnaire generation. Updated to reference Phase 1 priority PRO-CTCAE symptoms (84 items total).

safetyProxyItems.rationale: Monitor for neutropenia-related infection risk (nadir: days 7-12). UPDATED: Now includes fever (FEVER_PRESENT, FEVER_SEV)
Monitor for cumulative dose-related cardiac dysfunction. UPDATED: Added chest_pain (CHEST_PAIN_*), heart_palpitations
Monitor for low platelet count. UPDATED: Now includes bleeding (BLEEDING_PRESENT, BLEEDING_SEV)

drugModules.clinicalNotes: Anthracycline with dose-limiting cardiotoxicity (lifetime cumulative dose: 450-550 mg/m²). Nadir typically days 10-14.

safetyProxyItems.rationale: Monitor for neutropenia-related infection risk (nadir: days 7-12). UPDATED: Now includes fever
Monitor for low platelet count. UPDATED: Now includes bleeding
Monitor for bladder toxicity (acrolein metabolite). UPDATED: Added painful_urination, urinary_frequency

drugModules.clinicalNotes: Alkylating agent with myelosuppressive effects. Risk of hemorrhagic cystitis requires adequate hydration.

safetyProxyItems.rationale: Monitor for neutropenia-related infection risk (nadir: days 8-10). UPDATED: Now includes fever
Monitor for infusion reactions (typically first 2-3 cycles). UPDATED: Removed itching (not imported yet)
Monitor for low platelet count. UPDATED: Now includes bleeding
Monitor for peripheral neuropathy (cumulative, may be irreversible). UPDATED: Added dizziness
Monitor for taxane-induced musculoskeletal pain (peak 2-5 days post-infusion). UPDATED: Now uses joint_pain from PRO-CTCAE

drugModules.clinicalNotes: Taxane with dose-limiting peripheral neuropathy. Shorter nadir window (days 8-10). Neuropathy is cumulative and may be irreversible.

safetyProxyItems.rationale: Monitor for neutropenia-related infection risk (nadir: days 7-10). UPDATED: Now includes fever
Monitor for infusion reactions. UPDATED: Focused on available symptoms
Monitor for low platelet count. UPDATED: Now includes bleeding
Monitor for taxane-induced musculoskeletal pain. UPDATED: Now uses joint_pain

drugModules.clinicalNotes: Taxane with similar profile to paclitaxel but higher risk of fluid retention and nail changes. Requires corticosteroid premedication.

safetyProxyItems.rationale: Monitor for low platelet count (dose-limiting toxicity, nadir: day 8). UPDATED: Now includes bleeding (BLEEDING_PRESENT, BLEEDING_SEV)
Monitor for elevated transaminases and liver injury. UPDATED: Now includes jaundice (JAUNDICE_PRESENT), dark_urine (DARK_URINE_PRESENT), abdominal_pain
Monitor for left ventricular dysfunction (trastuzumab component). UPDATED: Added chest_pain, heart_palpitations
Monitor for interstitial lung disease (rare but serious). UPDATED: Added fever, wheezing
Monitor for peripheral neuropathy and neurological symptoms. UPDATED: Added headache, dizziness

drugModules.clinicalNotes: Antibody-drug conjugate targeting HER2-positive breast cancer. Dose-limiting toxicity is thrombocytopenia (platelet nadir day 8). Less myelosuppressive than traditional chemotherapy.

safetyProxyItems.rationale: Monitor for neutropenia-related infection risk. UPDATED: Now includes fever
Monitor for low platelet count. UPDATED: Now includes bleeding
Monitor for coronary artery vasospasm (rare but serious). UPDATED: Added chest_pain, heart_palpitations
Monitor for GI toxicity. UPDATED: Added abdominal_pain

drugModules.clinicalNotes: Oral fluoropyrimidine pro-drug. Dose-limiting toxicity is hand-foot syndrome (palmar-plantar erythrodysesthesia). Continuous oral dosing requires different monitoring approach.

safetyProxyItems.rationale: Monitor for immune-mediated colitis (can occur anytime, peak 6-12 weeks). UPDATED: Now includes abdominal_pain
Monitor for immune-mediated pneumonitis. UPDATED: Added chest_pain, fever, wheezing
Monitor for immune-mediated hepatitis. UPDATED: Now includes jaundice, dark_urine, abdominal_pain
Monitor for thyroid dysfunction, adrenal insufficiency, hypophysitis. UPDATED: Now includes headache
Monitor for severe skin reactions (Stevens-Johnson syndrome, toxic epidermal necrolysis)
Monitor for immune-related neurological complications. NEW: Added comprehensive neuro monitoring
Monitor psychological well-being during immunotherapy. NEW: Added mental health screening

drugModules.clinicalNotes: PD-1 inhibitor with immune-related adverse events (irAEs) that can occur anytime during or after treatment. Different toxicity profile than traditional chemotherapy. Requires vigilant monitoring for irAEs across multiple organ systems.
